definitions.body: hard, difficult, of a legal question ([[דָּבָר]]) Ex 18:26 (E).

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: severe, of battle 2Sa 2:17, wind Is 27:8, servitude ([[עֲבׂדָה]]) 1Ki 12:4 = 2Ch 10:4, De 26:6, Is 14:3, Ex 1:14, Ex 6:9 (both P); as n.coll. [[הִרְאִיתָ עַמְּךָ קָשָׁה]] Ps 60:5 thou hast made thy people see severe things; [[קְשֵׁה יוֹם]] Job 30:25 i.e. one whose time (life) is hard, so 1Sa 1:15 (reading [[קְשַׁת יוֹם]] for [[רוּחַ]] ´[[ק]]:, LXX Th We Dr al.); severe, rough, of lord ([[אֲדׂנִים]]) Is 19:4, cf. 2Sa 3:39 (c. [[מִן]] comp. [[[מִמֶּנּוּ]]? v. HPS]); [[הָלוֹח וְקָשָׁה עַל־]] Ju Jdg 4:24 the hand of the sons of Israel went on being more and more severe upon Jabin; fierce, relentless, of ´[[י]]:’s sword Is 27:1 (in fig.); rough, rude 1Sa 25:3; severe things, of language Ge 42:7, Ge 42:30 (E; c. [[דִּדֶּר]]), 1Sa 20:10, 1Ki 12:13 = 2Ch 10:13 (all c. [[עָנׇה]]); [[וְאָנׁכִי שָׁלוּחַ אֵלַיִח קָשָׁה]] 1Ki 14:6 I am commissioned with a severe (message) unto thee (Ges:§ 121d. N.2 Da:Synt. §§ 75 (d), 80); [[חָזוּת קָשָׁה]] Is 21:2.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fierce, intense, vehement, of [[קִנְאָה]] Ct So 8:6 (‖[[עַזׇּה ]]; cf. Ge 49:9).

[[עַם־קְשֵׁה־עׂרֶף]] a people stiff of neck, stubborn, Ex 32:9, Ex 33:3, Ex 33:5, Ex 34:9 (all JE), De 9:6, De 9:13; [[עָרְפְּךָ הַקָּשֶׁה]] De 31:27; cf. [[דַּרְכָּם הַקָּשָׁה]] Ju Jdg 2:19; [[קְשֵׁי פָנִים]] Ez Eze 2:4 (+ [[חִזְקֵי־לֵב]]), [[קְשֵׁא־לֵב]] Eze 3:7 (+ [[חִזְקֵי־מְחַח]]); ´[[ק]]: alone = stubborn Is 48:4.
